column4: Is anyone here proficient in ESD and willing to take a few minutes to throw me a bone?
The ESD I'm familiar with is Electro Static Discharge, is that what your referring to?
: I think I am having a conflict. As I knock out all of my sound, when I use both mplayer and flash at the same time. Videos unaffected, but no sound.
: I'm referring to Esound, a linux audio archetecture used to handle the playing of multiple sound sources through single devices simultaniously.
: I wish I could just throw on an esd wrist strap and fix my problem, but I tried to no avail.
Nope, can't help you with that, maybe your wrist strap is open? :)

: I cleaned my computer yesterday right, plugged everything in... except for my friggin esd wrist strap. You were right, it was just unplugged. (I still have sound problems, but not these anymore) haha
: The help is very much appreciated.
Ok, I was joking, but I'm glad you are making progress.
:basically my speakers were not plugged in.
Yep, when I use my HF I rig I turn of my speakers to keep the RF out of them, and then I forget to turn them back on! :/
